hero.title: Let's Talk About Your Digital Project

intro.description: Do you have a web, mobile or digital project? Our Numispark experts are available to advise you and offer you the best solutions.
intro.cta: Fill out the form below or contact us directly. We will respond quickly.

contact.heading: Ready to start?
contact.subHeading: Ready to get started? We would love to hear from you.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.name: Please enter your full name
errors.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.serviceType: Please select the type of service
errors.success: Your message has been sent successfully.
errors.server: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again later.

responseTime.question: What is your response time?
responseTime.answer: We respond to all requests within 24 business hours. For emergencies, call us directly at +33 6 02 52 87 71 Monday to Friday 9am-6pm CET.

initialConsultation.question: Is the initial consultation paid?
initialConsultation.answer: No, our first consultation and initial audit are free and without commitment. It's an opportunity to discuss your needs and explore possible solutions.

budgetPlanning.question: What budget should I plan for my project?
budgetPlanning.answer: It varies according to your objectives, complexity and technologies. We offer solutions for all budgets — from a few hundred to several tens of thousands of euros. Fill out the form to get a free and personalized quote.

inPersonMeeting.question: Can you meet us in person?
inPersonMeeting.answer: Absolutely! We are based in Caen and available for on-site meetings. We can also do video conferences if that's more convenient for you.

industryExperience.question: Do you have experience in my industry?
industryExperience.answer: We have multi-sector experience: e-commerce, tourism, education, services, SaaS, etc. Our approach adapts to your field and its specificities. Describe your sector in the form and we will confirm our expertise.

smeSupport.question: Do you work with SMEs/VSEs?
smeSupport.answer: Yes, we work with all types of companies: VSEs, SMEs, startups, associations. Our approach is flexible and adapted to your size and resources.

documentSharing.question: How can I share documents with you?
documentSharing.answer: You can attach files to the contact form. After our first exchange, we will provide you with secure sharing means (cloud, download link, etc.).

maintenancePackages.question: Do you offer maintenance packages after the project?
maintenancePackages.answer: Yes, we offer technical maintenance, hosting and support packages to ensure the sustainability and performance of your projects.
